title: Print, "Printer's Proof for Lumium Limited Letterhead", 1935
medium: Letterpress on white wove paper, proof
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, right:10=11; lower right: X; printer's proof for Kauffer letterhead.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: At left, an abstract figure composed of geometric forms, a triangular head and  blue and red dots for hands, stands slightly to the left and above the company name and address. Below: LUMIUM LTD; BRETTENHAM HOUSE / STRAND LONDON W C 2.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Printer's Proof for Lumium Limited Letterhead", 1935.
1935. Letterpress on white wove paper, proof. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-690-c.
